categories: Category:Enlisted stormtroopers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Tak Bazierre was a First Sergeant and a GeNode, and for a brief time, stormtrooper. Just before the Imperial occupation of Kashyyyk, he was assigned to Janzor's platoon. During their landing, he died when the transport he was on capsized, causing him to break his back on a branch of one of the world's trees. He was the first Imperial casualty of the battle.
